Title: Relates to establishing a period of probable usefulness for airport construction and improvement of the Ithaca Tompkins International Airport
Summary: Relates to establishing a period of probable usefulness for construction and improvement of the Ithaca Tompkins International Airport and for an above ground aircraft fuel farm located at the Ithaca Tompkins International Airport; establishes a thirty year period of probable usefulness for construction and a twenty-five year period of probable usefulness for the above ground aircraft fuel farm.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to establishing a period of probable usefulness for airport construction and improvement of the Ithaca Tompkins International Airport
